meanings.definition: The performance of extraordinary feats of balance, agility, and coordination.
meanings.sent1: During the circus show, the acrobatics of the performers amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: Gymnasts often showcase their acrobatics during competitions.
meanings.sent3: The cat attempted some acrobatics while trying to catch a mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her acrobatics on the balance beam were as graceful as a swan.
meanings.sent5: The acrobatics of the dancer left a lasting impression on the crowd.

meanings.definition: The practice or art of performing acrobatic movements.
meanings.sent1: The school offers classes in acrobatics for those interested in learning.
meanings.sent2: Circus performers spend years perfecting their acrobatics.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel showed off its acrobatics while leaping from tree to tree.
meanings.sent4: Her acrobatics on the dance floor were like poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: The acrobatics of the acrobat were a sight to behold under the big top.
